text: The men's tournament of football at the 2015 Summer Universiade was held from July 2 to 13 in Gwangju, South Korea. ==Teams== {|class=wikitable width=100% |- !width=13%|Africa !!width=13%| Americas !!width=17%| Asia !!width=13%| Europe |- valign=top | || || (host) || |} ==Preliminary round== ===Group A=== \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- ===Group C=== \---- \---- ===Group D=== \---- \---- ==Classification round== ===Quarterfinal round=== ====9th–16th place==== ===Semifinal round=== ====13th–16th place==== ====9th–12th place==== ==Elimination round== ===Quarterfinals=== ===Semifinals=== ====5th–8th place==== ====1st–4th place==== ==Final round== All of the following matches will be held on July 13, 2015. Only the gold medal match will need 30 minutes extra time if two teams draw. Other matches will go directly to penalty shoot-outs if the two teams tie. ===15th place game=== ===13th place game=== ===11th place game=== ===9th place game=== ===7th place game=== ===5th place game=== ===Bronze Medal Match=== ===Gold Medal Match=== ==Final standings== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! width=30|Place !! width=200|Team !! width=50|Score |- | ||align="left"| || |- | ||align="left"| || |- | ||align="left"| || |- | 4 ||align="left"| || |- | 5 ||align="left"| || |- | 6 ||align="left"| || |- | 7 ||align="left"| || |- | 8 ||align="left"| || |- | 9 ||align="left"| || |- | 10 ||align="left"| || |- | 11 ||align="left"| || |- | 12 ||align="left"| || |- | 13 ||align="left"| || |- | 14 ||align="left"| || |- | 15 ||align="left"| || |- | 16 ||align="left"|22px Chinese Taipei || |} ==References== ==External links== *Official Website football Men's
title: Football at the 2015 Summer Universiade – Men's tournament
